content: hey guys and ghouls welcome back to the second part of our graveyard vid today
we're going to finish up by painting them up and getting them ready for the
table so let's go to my table and finish up those graves and tombstones
hey guys here's our grave it's all dried nice and sturdy I'm gonna use black the
hand paint this you could spray paint it black but I'm worried about the
tombstone melting a little bit because if you don't get the total blue coverage
it will melt that dust styrofoam that phone core so I'm just gonna hand-paint
it with a wet down black and once I get that all covered I'll just let it dry
don't be ready for the next step okay here we are dry and I'm using earth
brown on this grave so I'll just water it down and paint up
the grave and just make sure you avoid the tombstone go around the tombstone
and get that nice earth color on there a lot of dried up it's all dry so now I've
been a taint the tombstone and I'm going to use a grey to paint the tombstone
look at that texture popping out there it looks great I love it so uh looking
to really look like a tombstone now now we'll add the lighter gray and really
give some texture on there look at that edges popping out the words and the
symbol on the front and we got the crack on the back really looking great there
so there we go a nice tombstone for your graveyard now we just have to finish the
grave itself alright I psyched I want to have several different types of graves
and one is going to be just a freshly buried grave I'm gonna use a
reddish-brown for that I'm just gonna kind of paint the top a dry brush the
top a bit bring out some of that detail I did with the hot glue gun as well as
the cork and just looking really good there so there we go there's one type of
grave I wanted to do another I want to have a grass on the grave so I've got
one I've just painted Brown I didn't do dry brushing yet and I'm gonna use some
full strength white glue and I'll just do some areas on the grave that won't be
grassy areas I want to cover the whole thing with glue just parts of it and I'm
gonna sprinkle on just pencil shavings these are just straight out of the
container where the pencil shavings go and kind of mush it on there and I want
to reinforce it so I'm going to use wet down or
went down white glue is 50/50 consistency and I'm just going to apply
it with a brush and kind of mush it down into the pencil shavings and that will
give a nice slurry of a grass that will dry and be really hard and what I really
like about it is it's not like standard flocking where it it tends to come off
this stuff will not come off all right so I'm gonna use a dark brown and do a
wash on the on the grass to give me a base to go from and I'll just wash all
those okay so it's all set let it dry and now that it's dried there we go see
that grass texture very nice very nice I want to do some dead grass on this one
we do something with live grass and dead grass so this wasn't me dead grass
somebody's a cinnamon color and dry brush it on that texture of the pencil
shavings to give me a grass like look so there we go it's really that textures
really popping out of the grave there looks really cool looks like a great
with dead grass on it I really like that alright no worries about it falling off
okay here's my other one it's the same technique with the grass I'm just gonna
use spring green this time and I'm gonna paint the grass up so it looks like it's
a sleeping grass as opposed to dead grass I just want to have different
types of graveyards I could use more ominous and recently buried in that kind
of thing so there we go look at that texture popping out there it looks
really really good so now let's go to the graveyard and talk about all the

looks really good and that paint job really makes it look like dead grass
I've got one with live grass and the same looks really good that texture is
fantastic and will not come off the tombstones hard the base is hard from
the glue and it's durable and here is our one with just the dirt and I thought
looks great - looks like a freshly dug grave so we are all set and ready for
